issue.title: [CF 1075] How to create Combat Ress tracker & How to create combat timer
issue.body:
1) I would like to use TMW to track a available Battle Ress in combat. I only need a number representing how much of them is available. (Or zero if there is none.)
2) Also, I would like to create a icon (or some text) to show me, how long the combat takes (for managing-rotating raid-wide cooldowns).

Are these two things possible (even by creating a lua snippets)?

***

I post this here because of instructions here: http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/forum/general/45541-forum-rules-please-read-before-posting, so I hope my questing is not missplaced.


> Posted by CurseForge user Achse_ | Imported from CurseForge issue #1075 | Raw

comments.body:
There are no easy way to track number of battle rezzes if you yourself don't have a brez spell. If you DO have a brez spell, its as simple as tracking the cooldown and charges of your own spell.

Use the Timer notification type to create your combat timer.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

1) At first, thats a little bit sad. Do you have any hit how to achieve it even not-easy way? (I play a disc priest.) And I am a raid leader.

2) Thanks for hint. I have shared the result on the forum, here: http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/forum/general/74179-in-combat-timer/

If you have any ideas how to meke it better, I will appreciate it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Achse_

After doing some investigation, it looks like it can be done easily (but you will need to download the latest alpha version of TMW, available in the files tab at the top of this page).

Simply check Rebirth by its spellID in a Spell Cooldown icon (spellID 20484), and it will show you the number of brezzes available and the timer until the next one (even if you aren't a druid).

Here's an export string of an icon that should do this:

^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Scooldown ^SShowTimerText^B ^SName^S20484 ^SEnabled^B ^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N1^S ^t^t^t^SShowWhen^N3 ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SCOMBAT ^t^N2^T ^SType^SINSTANCE2 ^SBitFlags^N245760 ^t^Sn^N2 ^t^t^N72331^S~`~| ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
